body_html:
This PR replaces a single function and 58 lines of code with two structs and 122 lines of code to do the same thing. In its current form, I wouldn't be inclined to accept it. Can you explain why it is an improvement?

(The original function is quite dense, admittedly, but I think a better solution would be to add one or two comments at the appropriate points.)

/cc @saeta as the original author.

body:
This PR replaces a single function and 58 lines of code with two structs and 122 lines of code to do the same thing. In its current form, I wouldn't be inclined to accept it. Can you explain why it is an improvement?

(The original function is quite dense, admittedly, but I think a better solution would be to add one or two comments at the appropriate points.)

/cc @saeta as the original author.
